formulas.raw: Maximum line: \( L_{\max} = \max\!\big(0,\ \text{CLTV}_{\max}\cdot V - M \big) \) CLTV after draw: \( \text{CLTV}_{\text{after}} = \dfrac{M + D}{V} \) Interest-only payment during draw: \( I_{\text{draw, m}} = D \cdot \dfrac{r_d}{12} \) Amortized repayment payment: \( P = \dfrac{r_r/12 \cdot B}{1 - (1 + r_r/12)^{-n}} \), with \( B = D \) at repayment start Total interest: \( I_{\text{total}} = I_{\text{draw, m}} \cdot n_d + (P \cdot n_r - B) \)
